title: whore-ray
author: whore-ray
content: To anyone who is on X/Twitter, I'm wondering how long it takes to get the creator subscription pass. It still says "Subscriptions Application submitted Â· Waiting for review" and it's been over a month.DMing Premium Support didn't help; I got a standard answer and no ETA (you are in line), and the same happened when I emailed them.Does anyone know how to speed this process up?Addendum: i asked on X around but no one could answer that question and on reddit in the subreddit its quiet about. Greets, Ray

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: I am not into it but maybe they really are reviewing still your application.Anyway, see this standard and requirements they have if you hit all of then.--> https://help.twitter.com/en/rules-and-policies/subscriptions-policy

comments.author: whore-ray
comments.body: Thx for your answer.Yes iam aware of the requirements. I passed all but its still in review and i wait over a month already but yeah..seems i have to wait longer.Greetz, Ray

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: whore-ray on November 14, 2023, 12:51:07 PMThx for your answer.Yes iam aware of the requirements. I passed all but its still in review and i wait over a month already but yeah..seems i have to wait longer.Greetz, RayMaybe they have a longer process with that. But all you need to exert more is patience. Or try to give them some follow up and maybe that will do. You're welcome, Ray.

comments.author: Ubakama
comments.body: I think the verification takes couple of time. Just exercise patience
